greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Complement of A078588.
comment: a(n) = 1 if (fractional part of n*r) < 1/2, else a(n) = 0, where r = golden ratio = (1 + sqrt(5))/2. - _Clark Kimberling_, Dec 27 2016
link: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: 1. a(n) = 1 if A078588 = 0; otherwise, not. 2. a(n) = 1 iff A024569 is not 1. 3. a(n) = 1 iff A089808 is 1.
a(n) = 1 if (fractional part of n*r) < 1/2, else a(n) = 0. - _Clark Kimberling_, Dec 27 2016
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 11 2003
